programmes.show_description: Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Crime drama with Ryan Gosling. A stuntman moonlighting as a getaway driver tries to protect the wife and child of an imprisoned criminal, only to get drawn into a conflict with the Mafia. (2011)
Action adventure starring Dina Meyer (Starship Troopers). An astronomer and a cryptographer unwittingly unearth a murderous Sphinx and must solve deadly puzzles to trap it back in its tomb. (2008)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
A librarian is sentenced to death, but given the opportunity to choose the place and method of execution. S2, Ep29
Two nuclear holocaust survivors find the courage to make a fresh start. S3, Ep1
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Airport officials are baffled when an aircraft lands on time, but is completely deserted. S3, Ep2
The hosts of a party leave their guests out in the cold when they hear reports of a missile attack and barricade themselves in their bomb shelter. S3, Ep3
Armageddon action! While the world endures a near-apocalyptic event, one family must use their skills and wit to reunite and survive. (2017)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Tentacled terror starring horror icon Peter Cushing. Following a spate of grisly deaths, a scientist travels to a remote island where he discovers deadly tentacled monsters are taking over. (1966)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Disaster drama. When a global scientific summit fails to stop an asteroid hurtling towards Earth, a young tech genius assembles her own team of specialists to stop the impending disaster. (2020)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Howie is fooled by a couple of car thieves who sell him a stolen vehicle to use in a stunt. Roy Rogers guest stars. S2, Ep11
Colt takes on a jewel thief conning investors with stolen Inca treasure in Acapulco. Priscilla Presley guest stars. S2, Ep12
Colt helps a homeless person who witnessed a judge's murder. However, events take a turn when he is injured and recalls his true identity. S2, Ep13
Colt tracks a fortune-hunting woman to Europe, but his task is made doubly difficult by the fact that she has undergone plastic surgery to change her appearance. S2, Ep14
Colt helps a washed-up billiards player make a comeback from alcoholism. Tony Curtis guest stars. S2, Ep15
British neo-noir crime drama with Stanley Baker. A convict finds himself caught between a sadistic warder on the inside and an underworld kingpin on the outside. (1960)
Crime drama. An ex-con tries to help his family by reconnecting with his daughter and clearing his brother's debt, but is soon drawn back into his violent ways - with devastating consequences. (2020)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Crime thriller with Charles Bronson. A lone high-priced hit man gets even with an underworld boss to avenge a double cross. (1970)
Thriller with Leanne Khol Young. A helicopter pilot and an environmental scientist lead an exodus of survivors in a search for safe haven after a catastrophic tectonic event. (2017)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Airport officials are baffled when an aircraft lands on time, but is completely deserted. S3, Ep2
The hosts of a party leave their guests out in the cold when they hear reports of a missile attack and barricade themselves in their bomb shelter. S3, Ep3
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Thriller with Leanne Khol Young. A helicopter pilot and an environmental scientist lead an exodus of survivors in a search for safe haven after a catastrophic tectonic event. (2017)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
During a drought, the explorers find a young woman who has the secret of eternal youth which Marguerite is very interested in - but is there a catch? S2, Ep10/22
Action adventure. British inspector Harry Sanders investigates diamond and gold fraud in Africa, uncovering a plot involving smugglers raiding a sunken ship. (1964)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
Crime drama starring Kenny Rogers. Las Vegas casino detective Jack MacShayne finds himself confronted by artful tricksters and corrupt police commissioners. (1994)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
A million-dollar bounty is offered to anyone who can kill Cordell Walker, and every criminal in Dallas is taking a shot at winning the prize. S2, Ep10/25
Sci-fi thriller. A team of disabled service personnel are sent to fight a pack of reptilian creatures wreaking havoc across the globe. (2017)
Welcome to LEGEND XTRA - your home for movies and series full of action, adventure, suspense and much more!
When unscrupulous hunters come to the Lost World, Veronica is captured in order to become a freak show specimen. S2, Ep11/22
Jody is seemingly abducted by a bank-robbing UFO. With the help of Howie, Colt and Terri try to get to the bottom of the extraterrestrial mystery. S2, Ep16
Action with Jean-Claude Van Damme. When he is imprisoned aboard a CIA submarine under mysterious circumstances, a deep cover operative must join forces with another prisoner to break free. (2018)
Thriller with Laurence Fishburne. A reclusive veteran armed with a shotgun and one bullet tries to protect a young girl targeted by a ruthless hitman after she witnesses an assassination. (2015)
